description.narrative: To support quality service delivery, UNICEF in collaboration with MoH completed four studies, namely on i) Early Essential Newborn Care (EENC) & Kangaroo Mother Care (KMC), ii) Interpersonal Communication (IPC) Skills of Village Health Workers training (VHW), iii) Mother and Baby Friendly Health Facility Initiative (MBFHI), and iv) growth monitoring. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
